name: Not Monument Valley
description:
You will play a little girl who went to the castle in the sky for the first time in this game. Have a good experience with this living artwork!

Control:

  • WASD = moving the avatar
  • J = shooting
  • K = place a flower (this can be only used once!)

The player avatar in this game can move, shoot, talk with the NPCs, and collect. Please try these features and enjoy the game!
